summary: Conjure Dremora Lord spell with Elemental Potency perk effect.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]CONJURE POTENT DREMORA LORD[/b][/center]
[b]INTRODUCTION[/b]
If you do not think just the fact that the Dremora Lord not be affected by Elemental Potency perk, then, the problem is solved!

[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]
This is the Dremora Lord with Elemental Potency perk effect. Its main features are:
[list][*] Level 46 (as default Dremora Lord);
[*] 517 health points;
[*] Full Daedric Armor;
[*] Weapon: Daedric Battleaxe of Inferno;
[*] Custom Fire Breath shout;
[*] Fire cloak (only in combat);
[*] 25% resistance to fire;
[*] Health recovery (out of combat);[/list]
[b]INSTALLATION[/b]
Extract the file into the DATA folder (SKYRIM->DATA).

[b]UNINSTALLATION[/b]
Remove manually Conjure Potent Dremora Lord.esp.

[b]REQUIREMENTS[/b]
Last update.

[b]KNOWN ISSUES[/b]
None as I know. If you find any, let me know.

[b]CONFLICTS[/b]
Will conflict with any mod that changes this spell.

[b]NOTES[/b]
[list][*] If you think he was very strong, let me know.[/list]
[b]PERMISSIONS[/b]
You are free to change/modify this mod. But anyway, let me know please.

Questions, comments or suggestions are welcome.
author: andbressan
